SEARCH

Interface IConsoleReader<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleReaderDate, ConsoleReaderDateList, ConsoleReaderInteger, ConsoleReaderString
public interface IConsoleReader<T>
The IConsoleReader interface defines a contract for reading input of type T from the console.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final BufferedReader
    br
    The buffer reader to read input from console

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    readFromConsole()
    Reads input of type T from the console.

  • Field Details

    • br

      static final BufferedReader br
      The buffer reader to read input from console

  • Method Details

    • readFromConsole

      T readFromConsole() throws InputException
      Reads input of type T from the console.
      Returns:
      the user's input of type T from the console
      Throws:
      InputException - If there is an error reading the input or if the input is invalid
